Summary: I was outside smokeing a cigarette on my porch and than all of a sudden a Bright green light appeared in the sky about a mile or two away from me, and lasted for about 5 seconds.
divs: Sighting Details1: I in was outside smoking a cigarette on my porch. 2: I just happened to be looking in that direction in the sky. 3: I have no explanation for what I sawed 4: I suddenlky appeared out of no where and scared the living hell out of me, and lasted for about5 seconds and just vanished. 5: I literally was scared to be outside any longer, I went inside and got on facebook to see if anyone else had seen what i had seen. My reaction was swearing. 6: the Object of light just vanished.
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Gresham
There were no other sightings in Gresham on or around December 17th 2012
